info.name: Shacknews pre-gamefly chatty homage
info.description: shacknews.com/chatty restyle. Something of an homage to the final incarnation of shacknews.com before it was sold to Gamefly and redesigned. Kind of an amalgam of the two (old+new).
info.additionalInfo:
First release.

Not the neatest or most consistent code in the world, but passable. Some annotation. 
Uses calibri as its main font, because after writing a thousand papers for university my eyes have difficulty processing anything else.
Larger fonts used in most cases because I shack on my tv.
fpauthor_26466 is me. Change it to yourself if you don't want my posts highlighted.
